mapper.insert: insert into user_sys_area (areaId, areaNo, areaName, sortNo, prevArea, deleted, `state`, enNo) values (#{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortno,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{prevarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_sys_area set areaNo = #{areano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaName = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortNo = #{sortno,jdbcType=TINYINT}, prevArea = #{prevarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, enNo = #{enno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where areaId = #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select areaId, areaNo, areaName, sortNo, prevArea, deleted, `state`, enNo from user_sys_area
